mapper.insert: INSERT ALL into board (seq, id, name, email, subject, content, hit, logtime, bcode) values (#{seq}, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{bcode}) into reboard (rseq, seq, ref, lev, step, pseq, reply) values (reboard_rseq.nextval, #{seq}, #{ref}, 0, 0, 0, 0) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT c.seq, c.id, c.name, c.email, c.subject, c.content, c.hit, c.bcode, decode(to_char(c.logtime, 'yymmdd'), to_char(sysdate, 'yymmdd'), to_char(c.logtime, 'hh24:mi:ss'), to_char(c.logtime, 'yy.mm.dd')) logtime, c.rseq, c.ref, c.lev, c.step, c.pseq, c.reply FROM (SELECT rownum rn, total.* FROM (SELECT b.seq, b.id, b.name, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.bcode, b.logtime, r.rseq, r.ref, r.lev, r.step, r.pseq, r.reply FROM board b, reboard r WHERE b.seq = r.seq and b.bcode = #{bcode} ORDER BY seq desc) total WHERE rownum <= #{end}) c WHERE c.rn > #{start}
